title: New Test Announcement for long content
content:
Test announcement.
This is a link: https://github.com/Firstp1ck/Pacsea/pull/85
This is a test to test the popup window and its ui rendering. here is some random text.Ok I need to have some more chars in this line to test what happens when the announcment gets to long. Is this enough, I dont think so, so I add some more like no should be enough.
 this should be on a new line :-)
